title: 有没有防跑图的插件
txt_content: 服务器卡死了有没有防跑图的插件

replies.author: Leng_FengDaDa
replies.txt_content:
跑图会让区块加载，区块加载多了没插件卸载不好，推荐你用:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
或者是:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... sortid%26sortid%3D7

replies.author: SmallKK123
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-453651-1-61.html
这个就行
求最佳答案
